name: Deng Adiang
bio: A strong, versatile forward who excels in transition and grabbing offensive rebounds.

name: Dylan Pratico
bio: Quick and elusive point guard, specializes in ball handling and distributing the ball.

name: Jake Dion
bio: Known for his sharpshooting from beyond the arc. A primary threat in catch-and-shoot situations.

name: John Helsel
bio: The team's anchor in the paint, providing rim protection and reliable low-post scoring.

name: Lester Abayan
bio: Rookie guard with high energy, often seen applying full-court pressure on defense.

name: Mahlik Franklin
bio: A hustle player who attacks the basket and converts second-chance opportunities.

name: Paul Gutierrez
bio: Veteran forward known for his fundamental play, strong rebounding, and mid-range jumper.

name: Sub Jordan
bio: A solid rotational guard who provides consistent scoring off the bench.

name: Sub Tacey
bio: A capable substitute forward who brings size and versatility to the frontcourt.

name: Austin Mayo
bio: Quick point guard who controls the pace of the game and has an excellent turnover rate.

name: Brandon Bigelow
bio: An effective playmaker and scorer, Bigelow played a critical role in the Yellow team's Week 9 upset win over Light Blue, providing 10 points, 3 rebounds, and 5 assists. He offers reliable production off the bench.

name: Jack Lloyd
bio: A strong bench contributor for Yellow, posting 12 points, 3 rebounds, and 2 assists during their final regular season upset win over Light Blue.

name: Kassian Prior
bio: A formidable rebounder, Prior was part of Yellow's game-changing bench performance in Week 9, tallying 11 points and 15 rebounds in the upset victory over Light Blue.

name: Kyle Haley
bio: A versatile combo guard who can run the offense or score off the ball.

name: Manny Robertson
bio: A commanding presence and a 'beast on the boards.' Robertson delivered the Alta Group Player of the Game performance in Week 9, dominating the upset victory over Light Blue with 23 points, 15 rebounds, 3 assists, and 3 blocks. He is a formidable center.

name: Miles Robertson
bio: Reliable mid-range shooter and capable post-up player, providing scoring depth.

name: Reg Dailey
bio: Veteran leader known for his tough defense and high basketball IQ.

name: Alex Philo
bio: Quick in transition, Alex is a driving force for the Orange team's fast break.

name: Bela Dobkowski
bio: A high-energy small forward who excels in cutting to the basket.

name: Cam Perta
bio: Defensive big man, Cam patrols the paint and is essential for securing defensive boards.

name: Drew Pelkey
bio: Rookie with potential, known for his ability to hit open perimeter shots.

name: Dylan Mackie
bio: Experienced floor general who runs the offense with precision and patience.

name: Hayden
bio: A reliable two-way player, Hayden provides steady scoring and rebounding.

name: Logan Letourneau
bio: A spot-up shooter who thrives off penetration and quick ball movement.

name: Bryan Rivera
bio: A versatile forward, Bryan can switch onto smaller guards and post up when needed.

name: Chris Cayole
bio: Strong rebounder and capable finisher near the basket, essential for second-chance points.

name: Fin Mitchell
bio: Contributed to Purple's balanced attack in Week 1 with 13 points and 9 rebounds, making him a reliable offensive option.

name: Kaleb Swetty
bio: A key piece of the Purple quartet that scored in double figures during the season opener, finishing with 15 points, 4 rebounds, and 2 steals.

name: Kolby Bradford
bio: The dependable 'Mr. Consistent' for the Purple squad. He was a key part of the team's balanced offense in their season-opening win, contributing 16 points, 3 rebounds, 4 assists, and 3 steals, emphasizing ball movement and efficiency.

name: Logan Tobin
bio: A leading contributor to Purple's offensive success. Tobin led the team in scoring during their Week 1 victory with 18 points and 9 rebounds.

name: Stanley Salley
bio: The team veteran, Stanley provides leadership and consistent mid-range scoring.

name: Wyatt Jarvis-comi
bio: A reliable backup guard, Wyatt is a steady hand when the starters need a rest.

name: Andy Bousono
bio: Quick and crafty, Andy is known for his ability to break down defenses off the dribble.

name: Isaiah Terrill
bio: A pure shooter who demands attention on the perimeter, creating space for teammates.

name: Jack Goga-blanchard
bio: A high-motor forward, Jack is tireless in chasing down loose balls and rebounds.

name: Joe Ruggles
bio: Solid defensive presence and excellent communicator, organizing the team's half-court defense.

name: John O'brien
bio: Veteran forward whose strength allows him to guard both power forwards and centers.

name: Kenny Black
bio: An experienced guard known for his clutch performance in the fourth quarter.

name: Tanner Freeman
bio: A young guard with promising playmaking abilities and a willingness to learn.

name: Tyrone Conley
bio: Versatile wing player, capable of attacking the basket and finishing through contact.

name: Avery Barrino
bio: A primary scorer for the Blue team, Avery is a threat from all three levels of the court.

name: Dylan Hill-Quintin
bio: Controls the offense with poise, often setting up backdoor cuts and easy scores.

name: Ethan Calle
bio: A forward with a high basketball IQ, specializing in finding gaps in the defense for open shots.

name: Jerome Stewart
bio: Known for his powerful dunks and ability to command the glass on both ends.

name: Jonathan Billado
bio: A reliable rotational guard who gives maximum effort on every possession.

name: Jordan Maille
bio: Rookie forward who is aggressive on the offensive glass and shows promise as a defender.

name: Nate Luong
bio: A quick guard whose specialty is penetrating the defense and kicking out to open shooters.

name: Tavarius Vance
bio: The veteran leader of the team, Tavarius uses his experience to outsmart opponents.

name: Aaron West
bio: A tough two-way player, Aaron provides steady defense and is a capable finisher in the paint.

name: Bobby Yefchak
bio: Known for his energetic defense and willingness to dive for loose balls.

name: Cole Sampson
bio: The floor general, Cole has excellent vision and manages the team's offense efficiently.

name: Hakeem Faud
bio: Dynamic guard with deep range and an unstoppable crossover.

name: James Hare
bio: Experienced shooting guard, James can create his own shot, spreads the floors, and is a threat in isolation.

name: Mark Niigolian
bio: The team's defensive specialist, Mark excels at disrupting passing lanes and forcing turnovers.

name: Peter Lindholm
bio: Talented forward, spreads the floor, and provides strong post defense.

name: Tre Grubbs
bio: A steady backup guard who rarely makes mistakes and provides reliable minutes.

name: Ben Litteken
bio: A talented combo guard capable of scoring in bunches and running the fast break.

name: Carter Beeman
bio: Smart point guard, Carter has a knack for knowing where the defense is weakest.

name: Cory Chaplin
bio: A physical small forward who attacks the paint relentlessly and draws fouls.

name: Dan Faris
bio: Veteran center known for his solid rebounding and effective screen-setting.

name: Edo Semic
bio: Long-time forward, Edo is a consistent presence, providing reliable shooting from the baseline.

name: Kerry Lyons
bio: A quick guard whose defense often jumpstarts the Red team's offense.

name: Shu Li
bio: Rookie guard with high upside, Shu is developing a reputation as a knockdown shooter.

name: Timmy Ashley
bio: A solid power forward, Timmy excels at catching and finishing passes in the lane.

name: Brody Snow
bio: Scored timely buckets for Green in the season opener, contributing 10 points to their effort.

name: Cody Jarvis
bio: The tallest player on the roster, Cody is an imposing figure defensively and offensively.

name: Cyle Chappy
bio: Veteran forward whose experience allows him to execute plays perfectly in late-game situations.

name: Emin Kekic
bio: A smart playmaker, Emin controls the tempo and initiates the majority of the team's offense.

name: Kyle Picard
bio: A reliable scoring threat from the two-guard spot, Kyle can create separation with ease.

name: Matthew Spear
bio: Known as the 'Swiss Army knife' for his versatile play. Spear led the Green team's strong start in Week 1, getting to the cup at will. His impressive performance included 29 points, 15 rebounds, 3 assists, and 2 steals.

name: Prince Yodishembo
bio: Rookie guard known for his raw athleticism and explosive drives to the basket.

name: Tavian Barrino
bio: Dubbed 'The Smooth Operator' for his finesse on the court, Tavian Barrino is a lights-out shooter. He was instrumental in Green's early lead in the season opener, finishing with 22 points, 7 rebounds, 4 assists, and 2 steals.

name: Aid Semic
bio: A rotational guard who provides solid shooting and consistent defensive effort.

name: Donnie Dwyer
bio: The team's defensive anchor, Donnie is a vocal leader who demands perfection on defense.

name: Eliezer Perez Jr
bio: Quick point guard who pushes the pace and keeps the opposition scrambling.

name: Jason West
bio: A strong forward whose primary role is rebounding and punishing smaller lineups.

name: Jeromy Anderson
bio: A dependable point guard who minimizes turnovers and maximizes possessions.

name: Jibril Abdullahi
bio: A core player for Light Blue, Abdullahi is a consistent scorer. He put up 23 points in the Week 1 loss to Black and stepped up in Week 9 with 28 points, 4 rebounds, 3 assists, and 3 steals.

name: Matt Riordan
bio: Riordan is a strong defender and rebounder for Light Blue. His stats include 13 points, 9 rebounds, and 3 blocks in Week 1, and an improved 17 points, 9 rebounds, 3 blocks, and 2 steals in Week 9.

name: Troy Mcilwain
bio: A versatile forward who provides strong interior defense and transition scoring.
